text: Lake Velence, an endorheic basin, is the third largest natural lake in Hungary. It is a popular holiday destination among Hungarians. The lake has an area of 26 km2, one third of which is covered by the common reed. Because of the sunny climate of the area and the shallowness of the lake, it is one of the warmest lakes in Europe: its temperature in the summer may reach 26 to 28 °C.Hungary: Peace at Lake Velence ==Location== Lake Velence is located in Fejér county, close to the M7 motorway between Budapest and Székesfehérvár, at the foot of the Velence Mountains. ==Settlements along the shore== *Gárdony **Agárd **Dinnyés *Kápolnásnyék *Nadap *Pákozd *Pázmánd *Sukoró *Velence **Velence-újtelep **Velencefürdő *Vereb *Zichyújfalu == Wildlife == A part of the lake is a bird reserve with a lot of species. ==Events== The lake was the venue for the World Rowing Masters Regatta in September 2019. ==Gallery== File:Civertanvelenceitolegi1.jpg File:Velence 1.jpg File:Velenceitó légifotó.jpg File:Velencei-to este.jpg File:Velence Lake Hungary.jpg File:Lake Velence 005.JPG File:Lake Velence 004.JPG File:View from Madárvárta tower to Lake Velence and Velence hills, Agárd, 2017 Gárdony.jpg File:Velence, Velencei-tó, 19.jpg File:Velence, Velencei-tó, 52.jpg File:Velence, Velencei- tó.jpg File:Velence-ResortSpa-beach.JPG File:Naplemente a tó felett.jpg File:Este a tónál.jpg File:A Velencei-hegység.jpg File:A tó képe Agárd felől.jpg == References == ==External links== * Google Maps of Lake Velence * Aerial photographs * Lake Velence at funiq.hu Velence Category:Geography of Fejér County Category:Tourist attractions in Fejér County
